Peel

public Peel(int xMovement,
            int yMovement,
            int xPosition,

Create a new Dr Peel character

Parameters:
xMovement - the speed at which Peel can move horizontally
yMovement - the speed at which Peel can move vertically
xPosition - the x co-ordinate of Peel's starting position
yPosition - the y co-ordinate of Peel's starting position
